page.title: 04A SURVEY OF HUNDLETON.
page.content: On Thursday 4th July 1985,class 5 did a survey of{Hundleton.} We split into five groups,four of the groups went with Mr Rees and our group went with Miss Clift. We started off by going down a lane. We stopped at the end of our grid along side a sign which said{Bentlass. Our group looked mostly at farming land.Rough grazing was the most common farmland. We started back up the lane and met Mr Rees.Mr Rees and Miss Clift talked for a couple of minutes,then our group started going the way that Mr Rees had gone. We walked on and then turned into a lay-by and looked up a lane,then we crossed the road and saw a football and cricket pitch.
